Text: How to register this game in regedit to change language ?
People please I need a register >? enyone ?

I'm having a hard time actually chaning language in this game, and the link mboveiri provided didn't really seem to help. I don't suppose anyone can actually tell me how to do this in a rather simple manner? thanks.

How to change

Open notepad and paste the below lines

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREDanger Close GamesMedal of Honor Warfighter]
"GDFBinary"="C:\Games\Medal of Honor Warfighter\GDFBinary_ru_RU.dll"
"Locale"="ru_RU"
"Install Dir"="C:\Games\Medal of Honor Warfighter\"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeDanger Close GamesMedal of Honor Warfighter]
"GDFBinary"="C:\Games\Medal of Honor Warfighter\GDFBinary_ru_RU.dll"
"Locale"="ru_RU"
"Install Dir"="C:\Games\Medal of Honor Warfighter\"

Change GDFBinary dll name & path, Locale, Dir path
Save as warfighter.reg
Run the reg file

NOTE: if you want French change GDFBinary_ru_RU.dll to GDFBinary_fr_FR.dl

Same for other languages..
JP,KO,PL,RU,FR,DE,ES,EN
